Module codychoules.application.inventorysystem
Package codychoules.application.main

Class ProductMenuController

java.lang.Object
codychoules.application.main.ProductMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ProductMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class represents a controller for managing the product menu. This can be used for both modifying and adding products.
Author:
Cody Choules

    • onTextFieldEnterProduct

      public void onTextFieldEnterProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the "Enter" key is pressed on a text field, triggering the "Save" button functionality, for ease of use.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent associated with the "Enter" key press.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the handling of the event.

    • passSelection

      public void passSelection(Product selection)
      This method handles the passing of the attributes from the selected object into this controller.
      Parameters:
      selection - the product provided by the Main menu selection.

    • displayProductInFields

      public void displayProductInFields(Product passedProduct)
      A method to display the details of a Product object in fields. This is used for modifying a Product by showing the current values of a current part.
      Parameters:
      passedProduct - The Product object whose details are to be displayed.

    • handleAddPartButton

      public void handleAddPartButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method represents the event handler for the "Add Part" button in a JavaFX application. It adds a selected part to the associated parts of a product being modified.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Add Part" button.

    • handleDelAssociatedPartButton

      public void handleDelAssociatedPartButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the remove button action event. It removes the part from the temporary associated parts list.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by "remove" button.

    • handleSearchProductButton

      public void handleSearchProductButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the search product button in a JavaFX application then displays it int table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the search product button.
